title: Education?
creator_credit: Chris Noonan, Malcolm Otton and Film Australia
brief_description: The possible future choices for education, ranging from the free schools approach to the use of technology as a teaching supplement are examined. This film is not an in-depth analysis of these issues, but rather is a discussion-raiser for teacher or parent groups looking at issues of alternatives in education
